## R Markdown

```{r}
url="https://api.bilibili.com/x/player/pagelist?aid=1873150&jsonp=jsonp"

tmp <- jsonlite::fromJSON(url)
```

```{r results='asis'}
library(dplyr)

tmptbl <-
tmp$data %>%
  select(page,part) %>%
  mutate(part=paste0("[",part,"](https://www.bilibili.com/video/av1873150/#page=",page,")"))

knitr::kable(tmptbl,format="markdown")

```
